name: 邵长鹏
abstracts: 我的研究旨在更好地理解量子计算机的力量。我特别感兴趣于量子算法、量子查询和通信复杂性。我也对符号计算感兴趣，在那里我使用Clifford代数、计算代数几何和不变理论的工具来自动化推理。其他一些有趣的研究主题包括Kaczmarz方法和随机数值线性代数。
directions:
量子计算
符号计算
paper:
1. Worst-case Harrow-Hassidim-Lloyd算法与平均情况正确的量子傅里叶变换与Noah Linden
2. 通过通信复杂性为量子启发式经典算法提供下界与Nikhil S. Mande, arXiv:2402.15686
3. 矩阵函数的量子和经典查询复杂性与Ashley Montanaro, QIP 2024, STOC 2024, arXiv:2311.06999
4. 测试量子可满足性与Ashley Montanaro, Dominic Verdon, QIP 2024, arXiv:2301.10699
5. 杠杆分数采样及其应用的量子加速, arXiv:2301.06107
office_address: 320 Siyuan Building, NO 55 Zhongguancun East Road, Beijing China

name: 王杰
abstracts: I am an associate professor at AMSS-CAS in Beijing, China since July 2021. I was previously a postdoctoral reseacher working with Prof. Victor Magron and Prof. Jean-Bernard Lasserre at LAAS-CNRS in Toulouse, France from July 2019 to June 2021. Formerly, I was a postdoc working with Prof. Bican Xia at Peking University. I received my doctor's degree of mathematics under the supervision of Prof. Xiaoshan Gao at AMSS-CAS in July 2017.
directions:

半定规划
实代数几何
符号计算
运筹学
量子信息
控制系统
计算机视觉
